name: solid-stream-aggregator
description: Aggregation on top of streams generated from a Solid Pod

scripts.start-solid-server: cd scripts && rm -rf data/.internal/ && npx community-solid-server --config ./pod/config/unsafe.json -f ./data/ --seededPodConfigJson ./pod/multiSolidPod.json
scripts.start-solid-server-extended-lock: cd scripts && rm -rf data/.internal/ && npx community-solid-server --config ./pod/config/extendedlock.json -f ./data/ --seededPodConfigJson ./pod/multiSolidPod.json

author: Kushagra Singh Bisen
